gradually dropped.from sentence: The performance of our model gradually dropped from sample size 7 onwards .

improved dramatically.from sentence: The performance of the model improved dramatically with sample sizes 3 and 5 compared to the sample size of 1 .

self - attention mechanism.from sentence: This result points out that the self - attention mechanism in the Context zoom layer is an important component to identify related relevant sentences .

evidence.from sentence: This result shows evidence that only a few relevant sentences are sufficient to answer a question .
